com.madrobot.text

Class English

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.madrobot.text.English

  • public final class English
extends Object
    Convert primitive types like integers to their representation in the English language.
    Author:
    elton.stephen.kent
    See Also:
    FileUtils#getSizeRepresentation(long)}

    • Method Detail

      • longToEnglish

        public static String longToEnglish(long i)
        Convert a long value to the corresponding english

        Eg: longToEnglish(3456) will return: three thousand, four hundred sixty-five

        Parameters:
        i -
        Returns:

      • longToEnglish

                 StringBuilder result)

      • timeToEnglish

        public static String timeToEnglish(long l)

      • elapsedTimeToEnglish

        public static String elapsedTimeToEnglish(long start,
                          long end)
        Calculate the elapsed time between two times specified in milliseconds.

        returns the elapsed time in XhYmZs format.

        Parameters:
        start - The start of the time period
        end - The end of the time period
        Returns:
        a string of the form "XhYmZs" when the elapsed time is X hours, Y minutes and Z seconds or null if start > end.
